newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price fell to $18.59 last week.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price fell to $18.59 last week.

text.p: The price of OPEC's basket of seven crudes fell to $18.59 a barrel last week, down from $18.59 a barrel the previous week, the OPEC news agency OPECNA said on Tuesday.
Quoting figures released by the OPEC Secretariat, it said the price so far this year (up to March 27) has averaged $20.79.
In March, the basket price averaged $18.69 a barrel, down from $20.49 a barrel in February and $23.19 a barrel in January.
For the first quarter of 1997, the basket price averaged $20.79 a barrel against $23.06 a barrel in the fourth quarter of 1996.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
